full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` RNAM RTOG GI BRTAGS PA'I GNOD PA'I RIGS BZLOG PA'I RGYAL PO YE SHES RDO RJE ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,('DI LTAR RNAM DAG GIS BRTAGS PA'I GNOD PA'I RIGS BZLOG @013B PA'I RGYAL PO YE SHES RDO RJE ZHES BGYI PA 'DI NI, 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA'I RGYAL PO'I RGYAL SRID KYI BLON PO RIN PO CHE, CHOS RIGS NI STOBS KYI 'KHOR LOS BSGYUR BA CHING GIS RIGS LAS BYUNG BA, JANG JONG CHEN PO CHEN WANG GI SRAS LNGA PO, BSTAN SRID KYI RIG PA DANG LDAN PA GUNG RGYAL MTSAN RDO RJE AER KHE AA HAS DANG , GSO RTZIS RIG PA'I BLO GROS RGYAS PA AA CHE THU TAR HAN THO YON CHOS RJE BLO BZANG CHOS 'BYOR ZHES BYA GNYIS KA'ANG ,NAN TAN CHEN PO'I GSUNG GIS YANG YANG 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO KHRAL DU, ^KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL, NYON MONGS KYI BRAN DU 'KHOL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS, SA SKYA PA CHEN GYI LAS TSOGS LA BRTEN NAS BSGRIGS PAR BGYIS PA 'DIR DGE BA CI YOD NA, DE YIS BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG , BSTAN 'DZIN GYI SKYES BU'I SKU TSE'I RGYAL MTSAN @014A *, ,BRTAN PA DANG , BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG BSKUL BA PO SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD GNAS SKABS MTHAR THUG GI PHYI NANG GI BGEGS DANG BRAL NAS PHAN PA DANG BDE BA RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
